name: Shi No Mori: Ultimate Edition
description:
Shi No Mori: Ultimate Edition is a bundle containing an indie game series, which includes:

  • A remastered version of 2014 indie-horror game Shi No Mori
  • An all-new prequel, Shi No Mori: Hajimari
  • A sequel, Shi No Mori: Regashi, written as a short story by British author and journalist, Charlie Benton.
  • Exclusive Shi No Mori desktop wallpapers
